overview: Loren a lusty romance novelist is suffering from writer s block. Desperate for inspiration She starts fantasizing sexy scenarios for her book. When two friends Danielle and Claude convince Loren to stop daydreaming about lascivious liaisons and start living them they all participate in one hot brainstorming session that finally gets Loren going on her book.
tagline: These girls have a wild imagination!
title: More Hot Wives Club
